name: AI Streamer Companion Backend
description: Backend server for AI Streamer Companion with real Twitch/YouTube chat integration

TWITCH_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Twitch application Client ID from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps

TWITCH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Twitch OAuth access token (get from https://twitchtokengenerator.com)

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

FRONTEND_URL.description: URL of your frontend application (for CORS)

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token generation
